channel.title: Gaming Speedrun on Kinnaman

item.title: Hollow Knight Speedrun 3:40:04
item.description: I successfully completed the Speedrunner 2 achievement for Hollow Knight. To gain the achievement the game has to be beaten under 5 hours. At 3 hours and 40 minutes I succeeded, but it is very slow for a speedrun - filled with mistakes and cheese strategies. For now, I am happy with what I’ve accomplished but part of me wants to practice until I can run it without dying accidentally.
